title: Taiwan Partnering Award: Building Research & Translation Regenerative Medicine Capacity between University of Southampton & Taipei Medical University
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: The sharing f research knowledge has led to the development of a new research programme in 3D printing for regenerative application in orthopaedics via a studentship that will commence October 2014 Healthcare Cultural
findingsText: This grant commenced summer 2014 and is on-going allowing the development of innovative methods to generate 3D scaffolds for application in orthopaedics. Process of developing 3D scaffolds is in progress and can be applied across healthcare sector Healthcare
